mapper.sql: ID, TYPE_ID, NUMBER, ADDRESS, "ISSUING_AUTHORITY", VALIDITY_DATE, VALIDITY, USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into CREDENTIALS (ID, TYPE_ID, NUMBER, ADDRESS, "ISSUING_AUTHORITY", VALIDITY_DATE, VALIDITY, USER_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issuingAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validityDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validity,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update CREDENTIALS
TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUING_AUTHORITY = #{issuingAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDITY_DATE = #{validityDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALIDITY = #{validity,jdbcType=TINYINT},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
